testplan.name: CMS_Header_4K
testplan.description:
Header check for Ultra HD (4K) content. created by Mohammad and Sassan on 4/21/2014
Updated by Mohammad Mahvash on 10/8/2014 to support both HEVC and AVC.
Conformance checks all are disabled, by Mohammad Mahvash 10/17/2014????
